Author: Etherlegends
Title: NEW! Ether Legends TCG Ethereum Platform
Body: Ether Legends is a first of its kind collectible trading card game built specifically for the Ethereum platform utilizing smart contracts with the merging of physical and digital assets, secured by the blockchain.  For more information, visit:  https://www.etherlegends.com https://www.etherlegends.com/game.html Gameplay Overview: https://www.etherlegends.com/Ether+Legends+Draft+Gameplay+Overview.pdf  Founder's Token Sale August 8th - September 7th - 2019 Details here: https://medium.com/@etherlegends/ether-legends-tcg-the-amulets-mfts-enjin-imbued-erc-1155-s-fa55504be988  Ether Legends trading cards offer astounding artwork and collectability. Gameplay takes minutes to learn and a lifetime to master.  Since early 2018, the team is still on a roll to bring the game to market both Physical / Digital.  Released to Mainnet: Self-funded project In-game ERC-20 utility token ('Gaming Token' Elementeum) - Released (https://www.coinmarketcap.com/currencies/elementeum/)  Special Edition ICO Card only 100 made air-dropped - Released (https://etherscan.io/token/0x55591531864a6f0788387b00a8ad98032ad9ac79)  Special Edition collab card only 50 made - Released https://etherscan.io/token/0x077fe80ef0c2e316bdaecef4af1b55794d088e0d  One-time QR code redemption (physical to digital assets) - Released  Physical to digital Tribute cards (Limited release - 500 per) - Released https://etherscan.io/token/0xd6dd2578d8a5e02e276a1100be4ccf74979bd21a https://etherscan.io/token/0x3f8ed9e2fb9cce3b375b5cb594aa1046f630277a  Digital NFT Men and Beasts (39 Cards - drop based on rarity - Common, Rare, Epic, Legendary) - Released https://www.etherlegends.com/catalog.html  Digital random card generator smart contract (obtain QTY: 1 random Ether Legends card for ETH) - Released https://etherscan.io/address/0x880f820900363c01d103d4c46773216a1a65f5d1  Continued development underway and ongoing (join us https://t.me/etherlegends): Enjin integration (1155) Creator's token release Physical Card game release Kickstarter Ongoing digital game development

Author: erikstarfish

Body: Hey devs! Would love to hear more about your project, and post it on our Facebook page, https://www.facebook.com/cryptogamescommunity/ Please send me a message on Facebook if you need help promoting for free!
